post:
Hello all,

Today we can offer you Voxility DDoS protected VDS instances.

What you get with this offer:

1 Dedicated vCPU E-2136 (Base@3.3GHz,Turbo@4.5GHz).
4 GB ECC RAM.
60 GB SSD RAID1 HDD
2 GBps premium network - LACP load balanced (2 TB clean traffic included, any additional TB €5 / month (this is just what Voxility is charging us).
Location: Los Angeles Coresite.
OS: Most Linux distros, Windows ISOs as well (bring your own license). Or upload your own ISO (ticket).
1x IPv4 address
1x IPv6 address.
DDoS Protection up to 1 TBps, Auto Layer 4/7
Instant setup! (Depends on stock and fraud check).

These specs only € 20 month (plus tax if you’re from EU)

Pay for a longer period and get additional discounts!

Direct order link: https://autovm.com/billing/cart.php?gid=10

We accept Paypal, Credit Card, Bitcoin, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@autovm.com
